column5: Our fully appointed garage apartment has a full kitchen and super comfy queen bed. We're centrally located in the charming Heights neighborhood on a quiet street just a short walk from 19th Street. It's a great spot for business travelers, or those wanting to explore diverse Houston. Fabulous restaurants and shops are an easy 5-10 minute walk. We're located just one block from the popular Hike and Bike trail which meanders its way through the Heights to downtown. Our property is fully fenced and your private retreat is in the back of the property, just above our garage.
column8: Cozy Garage Apt in the Heights
